channel.title: dude on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in dude on Barefoot Rob

item.title: two fifty per hour
item.description: 2pm 30 April 2001 Dude called me. "Yo. I wonder if you can help out a buddy o' mine." "Maybe." "He needs an expert witness to testify in court on a case he is on." "yeah?" "Yeah. It would kinda be a volunteer thing, because you could only charge two hundred fifty dollars per hour." "Well forget it then," I joked, almost choked. "Ha ha. Yeah." etc. - - -
